head.title: Schooner Nancy, Log and Lists of Provisions, 1811-1813. - Page #32

body.p: << First Page | < Previous Page | Page #32 of 71 | Next Page > | Last Page >>

td.p: Mackintosh, Alexander. Schooner Nancy, Log and Lists of Provisions, 1811-1813. An electronic transcription. MFTP #0039

div.p: Remarks on Board the Schooner Nancy hired Transpor[t] on the passage to St Maries from Makinac in the month of Novemeber 1813[.]

At day light hove short, made sail & got under weigh wind at ENE moderate, cloudy & very cold, at 8 came too at St Josephs, took in a cord of wood, & weigh'd again, at 9 fresh breezes at SSW at noon squally from the Westward, latter part of the day frequent snow storms, wind variable from the Southward at 5 PM came to in 3¼ fathom water about a mile below the rappids of ne Bishe, handed all sail, at 8 set the watch – at 11 rains snows & freezeses[.]
course from St Josephs to carribou W ½ N
course up Muddy Lake NW ½ W

At day light got under weigh, light breezes at East, attempted to get up the rappid, but fail, for want of wind, drop down come too, abo[u]t ½ mile, & commence heaving out some of the ballast to enable us to pass over the bar, at 10 hove up again, wind at NE & bafling, at noon rains, at 1 PM wind hauls more to the northwa[rd] drop down about ¼ of mile & come too on the larboard side of the river, hove more ballast out, at 4 heavy snow storm handed all sails, wind at NE & squally, at 6 turns to snow & rain – at intervals, at 8 set the watch, a very disagreeable night – latter part of the night freezes[.]

Fore part of this day cleared the decks of snow, fresh breezes from the NW cloudy and very cold, at noon clears up & the Sun appears, loosed the fore & aft sails to thaw & dry, the weather appears more settled, latter part of the day wind continues at NW & cold – unbent the fore sail & geer, Main S: stay too, handed the other sails, at 6 PM more snow, at 8 set the watch, at 10 still continues to snow, towards morning becomes more mild, & thaws[.]

td.p:
L E G E N D :
in red , modifications made by the editor(s).
in lavender , modifications made by the assumed author(s).
